column2: 3M exploring sale or spinoff of health software unitUPDATE 1-3M exploring sale or spinoff of health software unit Sept 10 U.S. diversified manufacturer 3M Co  said on Thursday it was exploring a sale or spinoff of its healthcare data and software business. column2: AIG wins narrowing of shareholder lawsuits over 2008 bailoutAIG wins narrowing of shareholder lawsuits over 2008 bailout NEW YORK A federal judge on Thursday narrowed several lawsuits against American International Group Inc  by shareholders who opted out of the $970.5 million class-action settlement that she approved in March over the insurer's 2008 bailout.
